name: INSetCarLockStatusIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for requesting to lock or unlock a car.

items.name: func resolveCarName(for: INSetCarLockStatusIntent, with: (INSpeakableStringResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the name of the userâ€™s car.

items.name: func resolveLocked(for: INSetCarLockStatusIntent, with: (INBooleanResolutionResult) -> Void)
items.desc: Resolves the requested lock status (locked or unlocked).

items.name: func confirm(intent: INSetCarLockStatusIntent, completion: (INSetCarLockStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms that your app can lock or unlock the car.

items.name: func handle(intent: INSetCarLockStatusIntent, completion: (INSetCarLockStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles locking or unlocking the car.
